  • Method Details

    • search

      SearchResult search(SearchQuery sq)
      Runs a subject search
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query to run
      Returns:
      the results obtained by carrying out the search

    • getKeys

      org.crosswire.jsword.passage.Key getKeys(SearchQuery sq)
      Returns the search keys for this search, i.e. not the topical/headings
      Parameters:
      sq - the search query to run
      Returns:
      the key

    • searchByReference

      SearchResult searchByReference(String referenceQuerySyntax)
      Search by a referenceQuerySyntax, or references if separated by a space.
      Parameters:
      referenceQuerySyntax - the referenceQuerySyntax or a Lucene query syntax to be looked up in the expanded references fields
      Returns:
      the search result a list of topics that match.

    • searchByMultipleReferences

      SearchResult searchByMultipleReferences(String[] version, String references)
      First resolves the reference and expands it to its full form (e.g. Gen.1.1-3 goes to Gen.1.1 Gen.1.2 Gen 1.3), Then carries out a search against all subjects.
      Parameters:
      version - the version
      references - the references
      Returns:
      the search result
